DOC.brief_summary: The primary endpoint study assess objective tumor response rate patient advance epithelial ovarian cancer receive combination Gemcitabine dose 1250 mg/m2 ( Day 1 8 ) Cisplatin 75 mg/m2 ( Day 1 ) first-line treatment
DOC.criteria: ECOG = 02 Operated patient disease stage IIIIV No prior chemotherapy radiation therapy
